text.div:
Generated Narrative: CodeSystem TreatmentNotGiven

This case-insensitive code system https://kip.rkkp.dk/fhir/CodeSystem/TreatmentNotGiven defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
unsuitable Unsuitable for treatmentUnsuitable for treatment / Uegnet til behandling
unwanted Unwanted treatmentUnwanted treatment / Ønskede ikke behandling
died Died before treatmentDied before treatment / Døde før behandling
lack_capacity Lack of capacityLack of capacity / Manglende kapacitet
other_palliative_department Other palliative departmentOther palliative department / Behandlet af anden palliativ enhed
bad_condition Bad conditionBad condition / For dårlig

name: TreatmentNotGiven
title: Treatment not given; cause
